description: This file sets up a vector database using LanceDb, initializes a PDF knowledge base with a specific URL, and defines an interactive agent that prompts the user for input and responds accordingly. It also includes a main block to load the knowledge base and run the agent.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent class that handles interactions and responses.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base class that loads PDF content and integrates with a vector database.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: A class representing a Lance vector database.

classes.name: SearchType
classes.description: An enumeration for different search types, including hybrid search.

methods.name: lancedb_agent
methods.description: Defines the interactive agent loop that prompts the user and responds until exit commands are given.
